reviewText: This is AMAZING!  Like others saw it on Netflix and was pleasantly surprised to see how much Scriptural history is a predominate focus. Wow!
We purchased this for part of our homeschooling.  My daughter loves these DVDs and it spurs additional interest for research and enjoyment.
Just saw these on Netflix and wanted to begin using for Mixing History and Bible for Sunday School. what a way to strengthen ones faith than providing evidences of historical significance.
This show is worth anybody's time. The presentation is a wonderful mix of humor, history, and presentation. My family has already watched most of these videos and we will be shopping for  more.

Drive thru history totally rocks. I love the fact that it's history but it talks about what was going in in Christianity at the time being covered on each dvd. Along with descent cinematography of some areas I will probably never visit it's a sweet dvd set.
